GSP33yaissi_u:4: tatra mīmāṃsakāḥ prāhuḥ - nāyaṃ sarvārthadarśanaśaktisampannaḥ puruṣo
GSP33yaissi_u:7: / tathāhi - asya papratyakṣamanyadvā sādhakaṃ bhavet ? pratyakṣamapi laukikaṃ yaugikaṃ vā
GSP33yaissi_u:11: bhaktyā dhyānābhyāsāt prakaṭaḥ prajñāṃ tanotu me śubhrām // 2 //
GSP33yaissi_u:12: atha khalu tatrabhavān paramācāryaḥ śrīmadbhagavadyāmunamunirātmacintāṃ vidhāyātmasiddhau paramātmacintāṃ vidadhadīśvarasiddhāvīśvarasādhakapramāṇavyavasthāpanāyopakramamāṇaḥ pratijānīte tatre ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:15: vartate - asaṅkīrṇasvarūpasvabhāvavyavasthamāste, pravartate ca sve sve karmaṇi yathāyathamiti kṛtsnasya sarveśvarasaṅkalpādhīnasvarūpasthitipravṛttikatvaṃ sādhayituṃ - pramāṇato
GSP33yaissi_u:16: vyavasthāpayituṃ, prathamataḥ pūrvapakṣaṃ varṇayāma iti kārikārthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:17: atra tatreti prakāntaparāmarśakatacchabdanirdeśādetatpūrvatanaḥ kaścaneśvarasiddhagranthabhāgaḥ syāt , yo bahoḥ kālātpūrvamevavilupta
GSP33yaissi_u:21: sarvārthadarśanaśaktiśālinamavagamayatā hi deśakālasvabhāvaviprakarṣavyavadhānajuṣaḥ sarva evārthāstaddarśanaṃ śaktiśca gocarayitavyāni /
GSP33yaissi_u:22: na ca vidyamānendriyasannikarṣayogyakatipayaviṣayanipatavṛtterlaukikapratyakṣasya niravadhirayaṃ mahimā saṃbhāvanābhūmiriti kathamiva tadiha sādhanamiti
GSP33yaissi_u:25: sarvārthasākṣātkakārasarvakāryopajananaśakti sampannaścetanaviśeṣa īśvaraśabditaḥ sādhakābhāvādbādhakabalācca nāṅgīkartuṃ yogya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:27: atipatitā - apakrāntā sakalasādhakapramāṇasambhāvanā yasyāḥ evambhūtā bhūmirviṣayaḥ, tattvāt
GSP33yaissi_u:39: laukikapratyakṣasya viṣayā yataḥ parimitā vyavasthitāśca, ata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:46: rūparūpirūpaikārthasamavetasaṅkhyādaya eva viṣayāḥ, na tu rasādaya iti parimitatā /
GSP33yaissi_u:47: udbhūtānabhibhūtameva rūpaṃ mahattvaikādhikaraṇaṃ grāhyaṃ na tu paramāṇvādigatamiti tatrāpi vyavasthitatā /
GSP33yaissi_u:52: sarvārthasya tadgrahaṇasya tacchakteśca grahaṇamantarā ca na tasya grahaṇaṃ ghaṭate /
GSP33yaissi_u:53: sarvārtheṣvayogyānāmapi praviṣṭatvācchakteścātīndriyatvāt , jñānasya bahirindriyāgrāhyatvādvāhyārthānāṃ ca kevalena manasāgrahānnendriyeṇa kenāpi sarvārthādergrahaṇam /
GSP33yaissi_u:60: tat khalu yogivijñānamaindriyikaṃ na vā ? aindriyikamapi bahirindriyasambhavamāntarakaraṇajanitaṃ vā ? bahirindriyāṇi tāvatsamadhigatanijaviṣayasannikarṣasahakārīṇi tadgocarajñānajananānīti
GSP33yaissi_u:63: na cāvidyamānairajātādibhiḥ saṃbhavati sannikarṣaḥ ; tasya dvyāśrayatvādāśrayābhāve tadasambhavāt
GSP33yaissi_u:67: bhavati ca - yat yatsahakāri yatkāryajananam , tattadabhāve na tajjanayati ; yathā kṣitisalilasahakāri aṅkarakāryajananabījaṃ kṣityādyabhāve 'ṅkaram /
GSP33yaissi_u:68: arthasannikarṣasahakārīṇi bahirindriyāṇi jñānajananānīti tānyapi nātīte 'nāgate vār'the jñānaṃ janayantīti na tadupajanitaṃ pratyakṣaṃ yathoktaviṣayaniyamamatikrāmati /
GSP33yaissi_u:70: bāhyaviṣayamitiṣu ca manaso niraṅkuśakaraṇatāṅgīkāre hi kṛtaṃ cakṣurādibhiḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:71: ataśca na kaścidandho badhiro vā bhavet /
GSP33yaissi_u:72: bhavati cātra - vimatipadaṃ mano bahirindriyanirapekṣaṃ na bāhyapratyakṣagocare pravartate, tatra tattantravṛttitvāt /
GSP33yaissi_u:73: yadyatra yattantravṛtti na tattannirapekṣaṃ tatra pravartate, yathā'lokāpekṣapravṛtti cakṣuḥ svagocare 'ndhatamasa iti /
GSP33yaissi_u:76: na khalu suprayuktabheṣajaśatavihitasaṃskāramapi śrotraṃ rūparasavibhāgāvagamāya kalpate /
GSP33yaissi_u:81: bhāvanāprakarṣaparyantajanmanastu satyapi viśadanirbhāsatve prācyānu bhavagocarādanadhikamadhikaṃ vādhyavasyataḥ smṛtivibhramastrotasoranya tarāvartaparivartinaḥ kutaḥ prāmāṇyakūlapratilambhaḥ ? kutastarāṃ ca pratyakṣatayottambhanam ? /
GSP33yaissi_u:82: pratyakṣasya vā sataḥ kathamiva viditaviṣayaniyamavyatikramaḥ ? atikrāmato vā kutaḥ pratkṣatvamiti na viśvānubhavaiśvaryaśālini pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇam /
GSP33yaissi_u:85: tatsvalvanumānamāgamo vā ? anumānamapi viśeṣatodṛṣṭaṃ sāmānyatodṛṣṭaṃ vā ? tatra sakalapadavīdavīyasi bhagavati na tāvatsvalakṣaṇasākṣātkārapūrvakāvinābhāvāvadhāraṇādhīnodayatvādidamanumānamudatumalam na hyanavagatacarahutabhujastadavinābhāvitayā dhūmamanusandhātumīśate /
GSP33yaissi_u:86: naca sarvārthanirmāṇasākṣātkārapaṭīyasi liṅgaṃ sāmānyatodṛṣṭamapi kiñcana labhyate/
GSP33yaissi_u:95: sarvārtheṣvevambhūtā api padārthāḥ praviṣṭā iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:114: pratyakṣatvavyāpakatvādvartamānārthagrāhakatvasya yogijñānamapi pratyakṣaṃ cedvartamānaikagrāhi bhavediti na tasya sarvārthagrāhakatvam /
GSP33yaissi_u:124: iha cāntyāvayavibhyaḥ prabhṛti ādvyaṇukakamakhilamavayavikramanihīyamānanānāvayavavyatiṣaṅgaviśeṣajanitamavagatam ityantata upādānaṃ caturvidhāḥ paramāṇavaḥ prapañcasya /
GSP33yaissi_u:128: na cāmī svasamavāyināvapi dharmādharmāvalamavalokayitumiti tadatirekī nikhilabhuvananirmāṇa nipuṇo 'dhikaraṇasiddhāntasamadhigataniratiśayasahajasakalaviṣayasaṃvideśvaryaśakyatyatiśayaḥ
GSP33yaissi_u:132: tathāhi - kimidamekacetanādhīnatvaṃ nāmābhipretaṃ tanubhūvanādeḥ ? tadāyattatvamiti cet
GSP33yaissi_u:136: yaiḥ svayogyārthasannikarṣarūpasahakārikāraṇamadhigatam , evaṃbhūtāni cakṣurādīni svaviṣayapratyakṣajñānajanakānīti loke prasiddhamityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:161: atha tasya manomātrajanyatve 'pi na tatpramāṇatvaṃ sarvārthadyagrāhakatvādevetyāha ' nāpyāntare' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:165: manasaḥ sākṣādeva bāhyārthagrāhakatve doṣamāha ' niraṅkuśe' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:167: evaṃ manasi hetumupapādya sādhyaṃ prayogamukhataḥ sādhayati ' bhavatī ' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:176: yadyatra kārye yatsahakārisamavadhānādhīnajananavyāpāravat tattadasamavadhāne na tatkāryajanakatāvat , yathā'lokasahakārikaṃ jakṣurnālokābhāve svārthaghaṭādicākṣuṣajanakamityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:186: tāvatā yogicakṣurādinā sarvārthāgrahaṇasya kimāyātam ? atrāha ' śakteśce '
GSP33yaissi_u:188: cakṣuṣo hi svābhāvikaṃ sāmarthyaṃ rūparūpyādigrahaṇa eva, na tu yogādināpi rasādigrahaṇe sāmarthyaṃ tasya saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:189: tathāca pāṭavātiśayāddhavīyo 'pi sūkṣmatamaṃ rūpaṃ gṛhṇātu nāma yogicakṣuḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:193: maryādā ca cakṣuṣo rūpādiṣu caturṣu rūpasyaiva grāhakatvamiti /
GSP33yaissi_u:198: evamaindriyikatve yogijñānasya sarvārthādyagrāhakatvamupapādyānaindriyikatve 'pi tasya yathātvamata eveśvare pramāṇatvāsaṃbhavaṃ copapādayati ' bhāvane ' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:208: samuditāśayastvayam - anubhūtasya paunaḥpunyena smṛtyabhyāsena saṃskārapracayaḥ saṃpadyate
GSP33yaissi_u:209: tatparyante smṛtyabhyāse sati jāyamānā smṛtirevapratyakṣavadviśadaviṣayāvabhāsā bhavatīti pratyakṣasamānākāraṃ smaraṇameva cedyogipratyakṣaṃ vivakṣitam , tarhi tasya pūrvānubhūtārthamātragocaratvānneśvaragocaratvam sarvārthagrahaṇādisamarthasyeśvarasya pramāṇābhāvena prāgananubhūtatvāt /
GSP33yaissi_u:211: ata eva pramāṇaviśeṣapratyakṣarūpatvaṃ tasya na tarāṃ ghaṭata iti /
GSP33yaissi_u:212: ' pratyakṣatve ' iti ślokārthopasaṃhāraḥ ' pratyakṣasya ve ' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:216: 'smadādīnāṃ yogināṃ vendriyarūpaṃ pratyakṣaṃ na pramāṇaṃ - na pramitijanakamityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:218: yogajaprakṛṣṭādṛṣṭasahakṛtasya tasya bāhyeṣvatīndriyeṣu traikālikeṣu cārtheṣu pravṛttiḥ saṃbhavennāma
GSP33yaissi_u:219: tat prakṛṣṭādṛṣṭasahakṛtamanojanyameva pratyakṣaṃ yogināṃ syādīśvare pramāṇam /
GSP33yaissi_u:220: pratyakṣasya vartamānamātragrāhitvamiti vyavasthā cāyogipratyakṣaikagocareti cet ; atra brūmaḥ - prakṛṣṭādṛṣṭaviśeṣasahakārādapi prāmāṇikasarvārthagrahaṇameva bhavennāma/ sarveśvare caikasmin na pramāṇaṃ kiñcit /
GSP33yaissi_u:222: etena paramātmadhyānajanitameva paramātmaviṣayamānasapratyatraṃ pramāṇaṃ tasminnityapi nirastam
GSP33yaissi_u:223: paramātmano dhyānaṃ hi tajjñānamantarā na saṃbhavati /
GSP33yaissi_u:225: śāstrasya ca kāryaparasya na tatra tātparyam /
GSP33yaissi_u:226: śrutipauruṣeyatvanaye punaranyonyasaṃśrayaḥ spaṣṭa eva īśvarasiddhau taduktatvācchāstraprāmāṇyasiddhiḥ, tatsiddhau ceśvarasiddhiriti /
GSP33yaissi_u:227: anumānaṃ ca na pramāṇaṃ tatretyanantarameva vakṣyate /
GSP33yaissi_u:229: evaṃ laukikayaugikabhedena dvividhasya pratyakṣasyeśvare na pramāṇatvamityuktam
GSP33yaissi_u:230: kimasya tasminnāyattaṃ kiṃ nu janmāthavā sthitiḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:233: ye hi yaddehādhīnasukhaduḥkhopabhogabhāginaḥ, bhavati hi taducitādṛṣṭaśālināṃ
GSP33yaissi_u:235: api ca śarīrāvayavinaḥ svāvayavasamavāyalakṣaṇā sthitiravayavavyatiṣaṅgaviśeṣādṛte na cetayitāraṃ paramapekṣate /
GSP33yaissi_u:236: yā punastadapekṣiṇī prāṇanalakṣaṇā sthitiḥ, na sā pakṣīkṛte kṣityādau sambhavatīti sthitimapi naikarūpāṃ pakṣasapakṣānuyāyinīmudīkṣāmahe /
GSP33yaissi_u:237: ekacetanādhīnapravṛttitve tu prabalabahujanasarabhasaprayatnapracālyairupalataru rathādibhirvyabhicāraḥ ārabdhatvādeva caitatsādhyasiddhāvadhikamidamupādāna viśeṣavacanam/
GSP33yaissi_u:244: yaścetanaḥ tena nimittahetunā kriyamāṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ ghaṭādikāryamityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:267: sṛṣṭiprayojanamanavadhirjīvopakāra prakārabhedaḥ sṛjyapadārthanirvāhyanānāvidhārthakriyārūpaḥ nānāvidhabhoganiṣpādana lakṣaṇo 'saṅkhyāta ityarthaḥ/ sampradānaṃ ca sākṣātparamparayā vā kāryapadārthaniṣpāditaṃ bhogamanubhavanto jīvarāśaya ityāha 'tadupabhuja' iti /
GSP33yaissi_u:269: evaṃ sarvavidhaparamāṇusarvajīvādṛṣṭasarvajīvopakāraprakārarūpanikhila jagadupādānopakaraṇa- prayojanasākṣātkartṛtvādi jīveṣi na sa bhavatīti kaimutikanyāyena sādhayituṃ svīyādṛṣṭāsākṣātkartṛtvamapi na teṣvityāha 'na
GSP33yaissi_u:273: yatsiddhimantarā prakṛtor'thoṃ na sidhyati, tathābhūtaḥ prakṛtārthasiddhernāntarīyakatayā sidhyannartho 'dhikaraṇasiddhāntasiddha
GSP33yaissi_u:275: tathācanikhilārthasākṣātkāritvādyantarā kartṛḥ kṣityādeḥ sakartṛkatvarūpaḥ prakṛtārtho na sidhyatīti viśiṣṭakartṛlābho 'dhikaraṇasiddhāntanayeneti phalitam /
GSP33yaissi_u:278: dṛṣṭājātīyasyaiva sādhakamanumānaṃ, na tvatīndriyārthasyetyanumānavṛttamajānataḥ svabuddhyatprekṣitāvyavasthitatarkābhāsa mūlamidaṃvilakṣaṇapuruṣasādhanamityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:287: ekacetanāyattatvaṃ jagato vikalpya dūṣayati 'kimasye' ti kārikayā /
GSP33yaissi_u:290: sādhyate, uta bhuvanasthiteḥ, āhosvidbhuvanapravṛtteḥ ? ādyayoḥ kalpayoranvayadṛṣṭānto nīrogadehaḥ sādhyavikala ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:298: taccharīrādhīnopabhogopakārabhājāmanyeṣāṃ ca tatrādṛṣṭadvārā hetutvaṃ taddehina ivāstīti ekacetanāyattotpattisthitikatvaṃ dṛṣṭānte nāstītyarthaḥ
GSP33yaissi_u:301: ārambhakasaṃyoge 'vayavasamavete dṛḍhe sati svāvayavasamavetatvalakṣaṇāvayavinaḥ sthitiḥ śarīrasya nirābādhā ghaṭāderiva prasidhyatyeveti
GSP33yaissi_u:303: prāṇavṛttyadhīnāśaithilyāvasthānalakṣaṇā śarīradhṛtiḥ paraṃ jīvanayoniyatnahetukatvādbhavennāma cetanāpekṣā dṛṣṭānte vyāpakatvena sādhanasya gṛhītaivaṃvidhā sthitistu na pakṣe mahyādau /
GSP33yaissi_u:311: adhikaṃ nāma nigrahasthānaṃ ca prayuñjata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:312: yadyapi samavetadravyatvarūpe phalite hetau na vaiyarthya prasaktiḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:316: cetanādhīnatvameva tu sādhyata iti cettatrāha 'cetana' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:320: asmākamapi kāryasāmānyasya jīvādṛṣṭahetukatvena cetanādhīnatvasya sampratipatteḥ cetanādhīnatvamātrasādhane jīvaiḥ sdidhasādhanam /
GSP33yaissi_u:323: sākṣātkartuṃ kṣamante yatsarva eva ca cetanāḥ // 8 //
GSP33yaissi_u:324: adyavadeva viśvambharādayaḥ karmaprāptāgantukopacayāpacayaikadeśaśālino na yugapadeva niravaśeṣavilayajananabhāgina ityantimaparamāṇusākṣātkāro na kartṛbhāvopayogī /
GSP33yaissi_u:325: nanvadṛṣṭadvārā cenaprayojyatvamātraṃ na sādhyate/ kiṃ tu cetanakartṛkatvam /
GSP33yaissi_u:326: kartṛtvaṃ ca kṣityādau jīvānāṃ nasaṃbhavatīti cet ;
GSP33yaissi_u:336: vedādvaidikānāṃ vacanācca tadanugrahata evānuṣṭhāya tattatkarma yathāvidhi samadhigatasāmarthyaviśeṣā jīvaviśeṣā eva pṛthivyādibhūtacatuṣṭayaṃ bhautikakāryavargopādānabhūtaṃ sahakārivargaṃ ca sākṣātkṛtyopādāya ca jagatsṛjeyuriti na kartrantarakalpanāvakāśa iti /
GSP33yaissi_u:345: nanu pralaye pṛthvyāderādyadvyaṇukaṃ vināśājjīvānāṃ ca tadā karaṇakale varavidhuratvena jñānopādānasāmarthyavirahānna teṣāṃ sargādyajagatsṛṣṭikartṛtvaṃ saṃbhavatatyatrāha 'adyava' diti/ na pṛthivyādīnāṃ sarvāśena pralayotpādau /
GSP33yaissi_u:346: kintu vartamāna iva kāle bhāgabhedenaiva tau kramaśaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:348: tathāca jīveṣveva keṣāñcitsādhanaviśeṣasamāsāditajñānaśaktyatiśayānāṃ hīnāṃśaprapūraṇātmakaṃ sarjanaṃ pṛthivyādyupādānasākṣātkārāditaḥ saṃbhavedeva viśvāmitrādīnāmivetyarthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:350: / sāvaśeṣalaye tu jīvaviśeṣāṇāṃ tattadbhāgabhedakartṛtvaṃ saṃbhaviṣyatīti neśvarakalpanāvasara iti bhāvaḥ/
GSP33yaissi_u:353: tatsākṣātkāro na ca jīvānāṃ ghaṭata ityatrāha 'karmaṇaḥ' iti /
GSP33yaissi_u:354: anyakartṛkayāgādidharmāṇāṃ cauryādyadharmāṇāṃ ca sākṣātkāre kṣamā eva sākṣibhūtājīvaviśeṣāḥ
GSP33yaissi_u:356: tathāca tattadanuguṇaṃ sṛjeyurnāma/ śaktimataḥ sākṣātkāraḥ śakterjñānamātraṃ ca kartṛtvopayogi,
GSP33yaissi_u:363: api ca tadeva cetanakartṛkaṃ jagati paridṛśyate, yadeva śakyakriyaṃ śakyajñānopādānādi ca /
GSP33yaissi_u:364: na ca tathā mahīmahīdharamahārṇavādīti kathamiva tattatkāryatvam ? kathantarāṃ ca tadupādānopakaraṇādeḥ
GSP33yaissi_u:367: api cānīśvareṇa parimitaśaktijñānena vigrahavatānavāptakāmena kṛtamavagataṃ ghaṭādikāryamiti tathāvidhaṃ boddhāramupasthāpayan heturabhimatapuruṣa sārvajñyasarvaiśvaryādiviparyayasādhānādviruddhaḥ syāt
GSP33yaissi_u:369: pramāṇāntaragocare hi liṅgini liṅgabalādāpatato viparītaviśeṣāṃstatpramāṇameva pratiruṇāddhi
GSP33yaissi_u:381: avāptakāmatvānna tāvadātmārthe sṛjati ; pralayasamaye pralīnasakalakaraṇakalevarādibhogopakaraṇatayā ca cetanānāṃ duḥkhābhāvāt duḥkhidarśanajanitakṛpāprayuktirapi nāstīti vyāpakabhūtasvārthakāruṇya
GSP33yaissi_u:388: śakyaṃ jñānaṃ yasya tacchakyajñānam, śakyajñānāmupādānādi yasya kāryasya
GSP33yaissi_u:406: viśiṣṭasādhyena gṛhītavyāptikaṃ ca śarīrādi viśiṣṭameva kartāraṃ sādhayet pakṣe /te cākārā abhimataviparītā iti
GSP33yaissi_u:408: nanvevaṃ sapakṣe mahānasādau kārīṣatvādimatā vahninā gṛhītavyāptinā dhūmena pakṣe parvate kārīṣādivahnereva sādhanaṃ syāt /
GSP33yaissi_u:409: sa ca tatra nāstīti aprāmāṇyaprasaṅgo 'numānamātrasyetyatrāha 'nacaivam' iti /
GSP33yaissi_u:411: sādhyasya pramāṇāntaragrahyatve liṅgabalātprasaktānāṃ viruddhaviśeṣāṇāṃ pratyakṣādināpavadanāt vahnimātre prāmāṇyamanumānasyavyavasthāpyaṃ bhavennāma /
GSP33yaissi_u:416: īśvarasya jatkartṛtvāsaṃbhavādapi niruktānumānamanīśvara eva viśrāmyatītyabhiprayannāha 'apace' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:419: svārthecchāyāḥ kāruṇyasya vā sattayā vyāpyaṃ buddimatpravṛttisāmānyamiti pūrvārdhasyārthaḥ
GSP33yaissi_u:420: siṣādhayiṣitasyeśvarasya tvavāptakāmatvānna svārthaḥ sādhanīyaḥ kaścana sambhavati sṛṣṭihetuḥ,na vā kāruṇyam,
GSP33yaissi_u:424: na copādānādisākṣātkāriṇa eva kartṛtvamityapi niyamaḥ ; upīdānamupakaraṇaṃ cāviduṣa evātmano jñanādiṣu kartṛtvāt /
GSP33yaissi_u:427: pratyutaḥ duḥkhālayaṃ jagatsṛjato na kāruṇyaleśo 'pi ghaṭata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:429: athāpi sṛjyakarmāpekṣayā sarjanānna nairghṛṇyādiprasaṅga ityatrāha 'tatkarme' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:431: ūśāvaro yadi jagatkartā syādanavāptakāmatvādimān syāditi pratitarko 'trānusandheyaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:441: īśvaraḥ kartā na bhavati prayojanarahitatvādaśarīratvādvā muktātmavaditi /
GSP33yaissi_u:444: jñanādiviśeṣaguṇoparāgeṇaivātmanaḥ pratyakṣatvāt jñānārthapravṛttivelāyāṃ nātmano jñānopādānabhūtasvātmasākṣātkāritvaṃ niyamato 'sti /
GSP33yaissi_u:446: jñānārtha pravṛtterjñane kartṛtvaṃ samavāyitvaṃ ca paramasti /
GSP33yaissi_u:447: tathā copādānādyabhijñapūrvakatvābhāvavati jñānādai kāryatvasya sattvādvyabhicāra ityarthaḥ/
GSP33yaissi_u:449: kāryatvasya kṣityādāvasiddhiraśakyakriyatvādinākāryatvānumānāttasya anīśvaratvānavāpta kāmatvaśarīritvādiviparītākārakṣepakatvāt kṣityādau kartuḥ siṣādhayiṣitasya kāryatvasya viruddhatvam /
GSP33yaissi_u:456: evamasiddhyādidoṣaduṣṭatvātkāryatvasya tena kṣityādau upādanopakaraṇādisākṣātkartṛ kartṛpūrvakatvaṃ na sādhayituṃ śakyata ityarthaḥ // 13 //
GSP33yaissi_u:457: atra brūmo na kāryatvaṃ kṣityādau śakyanihnavam /
GSP33yaissi_u:461: na cedṛśa eva sanniveśaḥ kāryaḥ netara ityavayavasanniveśaviśeṣapratiniyataṃ rūpabhedamudīkṣāmahe
GSP33yaissi_u:462: yattu śakyakriyaṃ śakyajñānopādānopakaraṇaṃ ca kriyata ita, tadastu nāma /
GSP33yaissi_u:464: te ca kṣityādiṣu yathoktasādhanabalasamupasthāpite iti na viśeṣaḥ prasiddhaprākāragopurādi kāryebhyastanubhuvanādeḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:465: nacaitāvāneva kriyāgocara iti viṣayaniyamaḥ kaścit kriyāya dṛṣṭaḥ ;
GSP33yaissi_u:480: dṛṣṭānusāriṇī hi sarvatra kalpanā ; na dṛṣvirodhinī /
GSP33yaissi_u:486: na hi kiñcit kriyamāṇaṃ karturarthāntaraviṣayamasāmarthyamajñānāṃ vā svotpatte 'pekṣate
GSP33yaissi_u:490: api ca kiṃ taditaramastavastuvi, yamajñānādi vyāpakam, uta katipayagocaramiti vivecanīyam
GSP33yaissi_u:492: na khalu kumbhakāraḥ kumbhātireki kimapi na vijānāti /
GSP33yaissi_u:499: na ca śarīriṇaiva kartrā bhāvyam, śarīragrahaṇenaivānaikāntyāt /
GSP33yaissi_u:504: adhitiṣṭhāsitadehasaṃyogavata eva tatpravṛttyanuguṇa prayatnayogalakṣaṇamadhiṣṭhānaṃ dṛṣṭamiti cet ;
GSP33yaissi_u:506: preryavastusambhandhinā prerakeṇa bhavitavyamiti ; na punardehasambandhena (ndhinā) bhāvyamiti
GSP33yaissi_u:509: tenādhiṣṭhānakriyāpekṣitādhiṣṭheyapadārthasambhandhamātrātirekeṇa dehasambandho nāmaparo nādartavyaḥ asti ceśvarasyāpi jagadupādānopakaraṇaissambandha ityuktameva /
GSP33yaissi_u:511: dṛṣṭaṃ hi daṇḍacakrādiṣu karasaṃyogādinā kulālādeḥ pravartayitṛtvamityucyeta ; tadapi na ; abhidhyānamātreṇaiva paraśarīragatagaranirasanavisāraṇadarśanāt /
GSP33yaissi_u:512: kathamasati śarīre parapreraṇātmakaḥ saṅkalpa iti cet ; kiṃ śarīraṃ saṅkalpayati, yena tadabhāve na bhavet ? /
GSP33yaissi_u:513: karaṇamiti cenna; manasaḥ karaṇatvāt kimastīśvarasya manaḥ ? bāḍham /
GSP33yaissi_u:519: nacāsmadādermanasāpyacintyaracanasyāparyantavistārasya mahābhūtabhautikaprapañcasya prādeśikaśarīrakaḥ kiñcijjñaḥ puṇyapāpaparavaśagatiralaṃ nirmāṇāyetyaparimitajñānaiśvaryaśaktiḥ śarīrādyanapekṣaḥ saṅkalpādeva sakalabhuvananirmāṇakṣamaḥ kartā siddhaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:520: īdṛśena kartrā ghaṭādiṣu kāryatvasya sambandho na dṛṣṭa iti cet ;
GSP33yaissi_u:521: atigahanagiritaṭādhiṣṭhānenātiprakṛṣṭādṛṣṭacarendhananivahasambandhinā hutavahaviśeṣeṇa mahānasādau dhūmasya vā kiṃ sambandho dṛṣṭaḥ ? yena dhūmaviśeṣadarśanāt giriśikhare tathāvidhāgniranumīyate yādṛśo dhūmo yatrāvagataḥ tatraiva tādṛśastatsampādanasamarthau dṛṣṭāntabhūmāvaparidṛṣṭo 'pi sāmānyavyāptibalena pakṣadhramatāvaśāt sidhyatītita cet ; tadidamasmābhirabhidhīyamānaṃ kimiti na
GSP33yaissi_u:523: imāpi kāryatvaṃ samarthakartṛpūrvakatvena ghaṭādiṣu viditasambandhaniyamaṃ kṣityādiṣu dṛśyamānaṃ svasampādanasamarthamadṛṣṭapūrvameva buddhimatkartāramupasthāpayati /
GSP33yaissi_u:525: viśeṣaprahāṇena kāryasya svinirmāṇasamarkhabuddhimatkartṛmātreṇa sambandhaniyamaniścaya iti na kaścidviśeṣaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:526: api ca vibhudravyasaṃyoginaḥ parispandavataśca sarvatra sparśavattvāvyābhicāre 'pi
GSP33yaissi_u:527: jñānasukhādinityadravyaviśeṣaguṇānumitātmasaṃyogino manasaḥ kathamiva sparśarahitatvam ? kathaṃ na vāyavīyadravyasyamahimaguṇaśālino
GSP33yaissi_u:531: atha kāryadarśanānumitasadbhāvānāṃ taijasādibhāve 'pi tattadviśeṣāṇāṃ yogyānupalabdhibādhitatvāt tadabhyupagame 'nekaniyamabhaṅgaprasaṅgācca tathābhyupagamaḥ, hanta tarhi prakṛviṣaye 'pi prasaḍhañjitadharmaviśeṣāṇāmanupalambhabādhāviśeṣāt anekaniyamadarśanavighātaprasaṅgācca tathābhyupagama iti sarvaṃ samānamanyatrābhiniveśāt /
GSP33yaissi_u:533: yathā-vivādāspadaṃ paramāṇvādi prekṣāvapreritaṃ ceṣṭate, acetanatvāt ; yadacetanaṃ tattathā, yathā tathāvidhaṃ kandukādi /
GSP33yaissi_u:541: kāryatvasya pakṣe kṣityādau asiddhisādhanāya prayoga uktaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:542: atha jīvaiḥ siddhasādhanatvasādhanārtha pralayanirāse prayoga ucyate 'vimatī' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:543: sati hi pralaye sargārambhesraṣṭṛtvaṃ jīvānāṃ karaṇādividhuratvānna ghaṭata iti kartrantaraṃ mantavyaṃ bhavet /
GSP33yaissi_u:552: evaṃ mīmāṃsakaidrūṣitameveśvarānumānaṃ tārkikaprakriyāmevāvalambya prāyaśo vyavaśthāpayitumupakramate doṣoddhāramukhena 'atra brūma'ityādinā /
GSP33yaissi_u:559: sāmānyaviśeṣaḥ-dravyatvādi pṛthitvādi ca, tacac kevalaṃ nityaparamāṇvādisādhāraṇamiti bāhyapratyakṣaviṣayatvena
GSP33yaissi_u:561: ātmano mānasapratyakṣatvātsāmānyaviśeṣavattvācca tatra vyabhicāra iti bāhyatvena pratyakṣaṃ viśeṣitam // 14 // 15 //
GSP33yaissi_u:566: kāryasāmānye kartuḥ kāraṇatve mānābhāvāt, kartāṃ vināpi kāraṇāntarata eva kṣityāderutpattisambhavādityatrāha 'na cedṛśa' iti /
GSP33yaissi_u:568: tacca puruśakṛtisādhyameva dṛṣṭamiti vicitrākārasya mahyaderapi sakartṛkatvameṣṭavyameva /
GSP33yaissi_u:570: sa ca viśeṣo na kṣoṇyādivyāvṛtta iti tasyāpi sakartṛkatvasiddhirapratihatā /
GSP33yaissi_u:574: kartṛtvāvacchinnasya kāraṇatvamastyeveti kāryatvameva sakartṛkatvavyāpyaṃ kṣityādau kartāraṃsamarthayatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:575: yadvā kṣityādi na kāryaṃ prasiddhakāryavilakṣaṇatvādityatrāprayojakatvamāha 'na cedṛśa' iti/
GSP33yaissi_u:577: kṛtijanyatve vā prayojakaṃ kṣoṇyādyākāravyāvṛttaṅghaṭādyākāramātravṛttidharmaviśeṣaṃ na paśyāma ityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:579: anyathā tvaprayojakatvameva adṛṣṭakartṛko rājaprāsādo na kāryo daṣṭakartṛkaghaṭādikāryavilakṣaṇatvādityādivaditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:580: nanu śakyakriyatvādireva tādṛśoviśeṣaḥ kṣityādyākṛtivyāvṛtta iti cettatrāha
GSP33yaissi_u:589: tatra ca tadvidheyakakṛtiḥ, tadupādānādyaparokṣajñānaṃ ca ghaṭakamastyeva
GSP33yaissi_u:593: prāmāṇike ca kāryatve sati kāryatvasya viśiṣṭakartṛpūkatvavyāptibalāt kṣityādau kartṛviśeṣasiddhirapratyūhaiveti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:598: evaṃ kāryatvaṃ kṣityādestataḥ sakartṛkatvaṃ ca sādhitam /
GSP33yaissi_u:599: atha sakartṛkatvānumānasya jīvaiḥ siddhasādhanatāṃ parihartuṃ kartṛtvesvarūpānupraviṣṭamadhiṣṭānādi vivṛṇoti 'adhiṣṭhāna' mityādinā /
GSP33yaissi_u:600: yathā jīvasya śarīrāvayavādyadhiṣṭānaṃ tatpravṛttyanukūlasaṅkalpena, evaṃ paramāṇyadṛṣṭādyadhiṣṭhānaṃ
GSP33yaissi_u:603: īśvarasannikarṣaḥ paramāṇvādau saṃyogarūpaḥ adṛṣṭe ca saṃyuktasamavāyarūpo vibhuddhayasaṃyogasyopagame
GSP33yaissi_u:607: adṛṣṭasya pravṛttiṃ nirvakti 'dharmādharmayo' riti/ idaṃ puṇyaṃ pāpaṃ
GSP33yaissi_u:608: vāsmin deśe kāle ca phalaṃ janayatvitīśvarasaṅkalpamūlādṛṣṭasya pravṛttiḥ phalodayānukūlatādṛśadeśakālādisahakārisamāsādanalakṣaṇā bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:612: nanu kartāramantaraiva kāraṇāntarataḥ kṣityādi bhavediti śaṅkāmantarnidhāya tatparihāramāha 'cetana'ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:614: tathā cādhiṣṭhātuḥ kārakacakraprayoktaḥ kartṛścetanasyāpekṣā kāryasāmānye 'syeveti kṣityādau sakartṛkatvaṃ nāpahnavārham /
GSP33yaissi_u:616: upādānadigocarāparokṣajñānamantarā ca tadadhiṣṭhānalakṣaṇasya kartṛtvasyāsambhavāt kṣityādikartṛḥ paramāṇvādisākṣātkāro 'pyāvaśyakaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:619: atrādhiṣṭhātṛtvarūpaṃ tat samarthyata iti parakṛtāsāṅgatyamiti śaṅkāyā nāvasara ityavadheyama
GSP33yaissi_u:620: evaṃbhūtasya kṣityādikartṛtvasya sadā sarvadarśinaṃ sarvasamarthaṃ ceśvaraṃ vinānyatra jīveṣvasambhavānna taiḥ siddhasādhanamiti cātra vivakṣitam /
GSP33yaissi_u:623: yatra yatra kārye na dṛṣṭaḥ kartā, tatatsarvamipa kāryaṃ prakṛte
GSP33yaissi_u:625: pakṣe ca vyabhicāraśaṅkā na doṣāya, anyathānumānakathāyā eva vilopaprasaṅgāditi bhāvaḥ
GSP33yaissi_u:630: tat upādānādi sākṣātkartṛpūrvakatvarūpasādhyabhāvavati sukhajñānādau kāryatvasya sattvādvyabhicāra ityapi sukhāderapi pakṣāntarbhāvata eva
GSP33yaissi_u:633: nanu tarhi jīvasya svasukhādau kartṛtvaṃ na syāditi vācyam /
GSP33yaissi_u:636: adṛṣṭakāraṇādhiṣṭhānaṃ tu sarvatra kārye paramātmana eveti dhyeyam /
GSP33yaissi_u:637: nanvevamapi svajñānādyarthapravṛttipūrvakāle niyamena svasya sākṣātkārābhāvāt svajñānādyupādānabhūtasvātmasākṣātkartṛtvaṃ tadā tasya nāstīti cet, na, ātmanaḥ svaprakāśatvanayena tadā svātmasākṣātkārasyāpi saṃmānayitavyatvāt svajñānādau svasya kartṛtvasya svasmṛtimātreṇāpi abhyupagantavyatvādvā na doṣaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:638: upādānādisākṣātkartṛpūrvakatvamiti niyamastu īśvareṇaiva tatra tatra nirvāhyeti ca na vismartavyama
GSP33yaissi_u:645: nanvīśvarasyāpi adhiṣṭhānasāmarthamadṛṣṭaṃ kathaṃ kalpate ? tatrāha 'na caivam' iti /
GSP33yaissi_u:652: 'tatsiddhe' riti pāṭhe tu śaktimadīśvarasyaiva vilakṣaṇapramāṇena siddherityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:657: sarvasyārthasya kriyākārakaphalavargāntaḥ pātitayā sarvādhiṣṭhānaṃ tadarthaṃ sarvasākṣātkaraṇamapīśvarasya prāpte /
GSP33yaissi_u:660: yatra kāryatvaṃ tatra tatra samarthakartṛjanyatvamiti vyāpterityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:668: kiñcidviṣayājñānādimattvena ca na ghaṭādau kāraṇatvaṃ kulālādeḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:670: anyaviṣaye jñānājñāne śaktyaśaktī vā aprayojake prakṛtakāryotpāde /
GSP33yaissi_u:680: arthāntaraviṣayaśaktyādyabhāvasya vyatireke prakṛtakāryasya vyatireka iti vyatirekasahacārasyāsiddheriti
GSP33yaissi_u:690: atha vikalpamukhenārthāntaraviṣayakājñānādeḥ niyatapūrvavṛttitvamapi pratikṣipati 'api ce' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:694: nanu prakṛtakāryātiriktakatipayaviṣayājñānādi karturiṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ cetyatrāha 'athe' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:696: yathā kaścitpaṭakāraḥ ghaṭaṃ na jānāti kaścittu jānāti, kaścittvanyanna jānāti anyastu tajjānātīti prakṛtakarturanyānyaviṣayaṃ jñānamajñānaṃ cāvyavasthitaṃ dṛśyate /
GSP33yaissi_u:697: paṭādyajñānaṃ ghaṭādyajñānaṃ vā niyataṃ karturdurvacamiti tattadajñānasya tatra tatrānaikāntyānna hetutvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:698: sarvasyāpi kartuḥ kiñcidvastu niyamena na jñāyate iti tu durvacamevetyāha 'na cāstī' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:702: tathā ca tattadajñānasya tatra tatra vyabhicāre 'pi niruktarūpāvacchinnajñānābhāvasya niyatapūrvavṛttitvasambhava eveti cet, evamapi pūrvokmanyathāsiddhatvaṃ durvārameveti dhyeyam /
GSP33yaissi_u:706: ekaṃ dehaṃ parityajya dehāntaraparigrahaṇaṃ kurvato jīvasya tadā/ḍaśarīritvādita bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:707: yogino yogabalājjīvato dehāntaragrahaṇaṃ kurvato jīvasya tadāśarīritvāditi bhāvaḥ
GSP33yaissi_u:708: / yogino yogabalājjīvato dehāntaragrahaṇaṃ saśarīrasyaiva dṛṣṭamityayogina ityuktam /
GSP33yaissi_u:713: tathā ca kartuḥ śarīratvaniyame na vyabhicāra iti cet ; atra brūmaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:718: evaṃ śarīropādāne kartṛtvaṃ jīvasyā śarīrasyaiveti samarthya śarīrapreraṇe kartṛtvamapyaśarīrasyaivetyāha 'kiñce' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:722: adhiṣṭhānakarmībhūtasya kāṣṭhāde stacchettṛtāvacchedakatvaṃ yathā na tadvaditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:723: nanu svādhiṣṭhātṛsambaddhasya dehasya kathaṃ nādhiṣṭhātṛtāvacchedakatā ? iti śaṅkate 'adhitiṣṭhāsite' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:729: tadadhiṣṭhātṛtvasya kāṣṭhāsaṃbaddhasya kuṭhārasya cchettṛtvasyevāsaṃbhavādadhiṣṭheyasambandhinādhiṣṭhātrā bhavitavyamityeva niyamaḥ, na tu dehasaṃbandhinā bhāvyamitīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:730: preraṇaṃ prati preryasambandha eva hetuḥ na dehasambandha ityatra niyāmakaṃ pṛcchati 'kuta' iti /
GSP33yaissi_u:743: tathā ca dehatadavayavabhinnavastupravartane dehahastādivyāpārāpekṣāsyeveti neśvarasyānākṛteḥ paramāṇvādyadhiṣṭhātṛtvaṃ saṃbhavatītyāśayaḥ śaṅkituḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:752: dehasya kiṃ saṅkalpe kartṛtvam ? yena yena tadabhāve
GSP33yaissi_u:755: tatra karaṇaṃ śarīramiti cenna, manasa eva karaṇatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:761: 'manasaivaitān kāmān paśyan ramateya ete brahmaloke' 'manasaiva jagatsṛṣṭi'-mityādinā muktasyeśvarasya ca manovattvaṃ, tata eva jñānasaṅkalpādikaṃ ca pratīyate /
GSP33yaissi_u:764: īśvare nityajñānacikīrṣāprayatnavādināṃ tārkikāṇāṃ mate tu na tarāṃ śarīrādyapekṣā /
GSP33yaissi_u:765: atra manovattvāgantukasaṅkalpādisamarthanaṃ tu tadekadeśimatena vā siddhāntacchāyayā veti bodhyam /
GSP33yaissi_u:771: samarthakartṛpūrvakatvena kāryatvasya vyāptergṛhītatvāt tataḥ kṣityādau sidhyataḥ karturīśvarasyāśarīritvaiśvaryādyeva setsyati 'yakṣānurūpo bali' riti nyāyāt /
GSP33yaissi_u:780: sarīrābhāve 'pi prāyaṇāvāntaralayādau nityendriyatayā manasaḥ sattvātkālāvacchedena śarīravyāpyatvaṃ manaso nāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:781: nanvevamapi saśarīrasyaiva kartṛtvaṃ tatra tatra dṛṣṭāmiti śarīrikartṛkatvena vyāptiḥ kāryatvasya kuto na gṛhyata ityatrāha
GSP33yaissi_u:783: dṛṣṭānuguṇaṃ kāryānugumatvena dṛṣṭamata eva vyāptyupayogi thadrūpaṃ tadavacchinnenaiva vyāptireṣṭavyā
GSP33yaissi_u:785: te yadyapi karmaparavaśe kulālādau śarīrādhīne ; naitāvatā śarīrādervyāpakatāvacchedakakoṭiniveśa iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:792: akarmavaśyatvāśarīritvasarvajñatvādiviśiṣṭakartrā kāryatvasyāvinābhāvo ghaṭādau na dṛṣṭa iti śaṅkiturbhāvaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:793: sāmānyadharmāvacchinnavyāptigrahādeva pakṣadharmatābalasahakārātpakṣīyasādhya viśeṣasiddhiriti hārdena pratibandīmāha 'atigahane' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:810: dhūmātparvate vahniviśeṣānumānāt kāryatvāt kṣityādau kartṛviśeṣānumānasya na vailakṣaṇyam
GSP33yaissi_u:821: atrāyaṃ pratitarko vivakṣitaḥ-mano yadi paricchinnaparimāmavat syāt
GSP33yaissi_u:826: yadyapi mahato vāyorgatiśīlasyāniyatādhiṣṭhānatvamudbhūtasparśavattvāt spārśanapratyakṣatvaṃ ca bhūyo dṛṣṭam /
GSP33yaissi_u:833: evaṃ rūpasparśaubhayatadanyatarodbhavasya bhūyo dṛṣṭatve 'pi cakṣuṣo rūpadiṣu rūpādiṣu rūpamātravyañjakatvenānumitataijasabhāvasya tadubhayānudbhavaḥ
GSP33yaissi_u:835: cakṣuṣaḥ taijasamahatkaryatve rūpasparśānyatarodbhavaḥ syāditi prasaṅgo 'tra bodhyaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:851: tathā ca pratitarkāṇāṃ chinnamūlatvaṃ ca vivakṣitam /
GSP33yaissi_u:854: tulyanayena kratṛtve saśarīratvamiti niyamo 'pi nāstītyāśayavānāheśvaravādī 'hantatarhī' ti
GSP33yaissi_u:861: īśvarasya sa dharmo nitya evopeyata iti pakṣe ca dharmasāmānyasya vihitakriyājanyatvaniyamabhaṅgaḥ
GSP33yaissi_u:865: sahacāramātreṇa kartṛtvasya na saśarīratvādivyāptiḥ, vipakṣe bādhakavirahāditi ca hārdam /
GSP33yaissi_u:872: 'tathe' ti pāṭhe tu tathā hi nītayo dṛśyanta ityanvayaḥ /
GSP33yaissi_u:885: paramāṇvādigocarāvīśvarasya saṅkalpaprayatnau prasādhya sākṣātkāramapi tādṛśaṃ sādhayati 'tathe' ti /
GSP33yaissi_u:891: na caitatsākṣātkartṛtvaṃ jīvānāmiti na taiḥ siddhasādhanam /
GSP33yaissi_u:893: atha sākṣādevātīndriyārthān pakṣīkṛtya pratyakṣaviṣayatvaṃ sādhayati 'pratyakṣam' iti /
GSP33yaissi_u:922: yathākarma phalapradatvāt svāmitvamapi sarvasya tasmin pratitiṣṭhatyeva /
